_source.text: Aaron Paul is excellent as Jesse in "Breaking Bad," but better than Michael Emerson or Terry O'Quinn of "Lost"?

text: **Aaron** Paul is excellent as Jesse in "Breaking Bad," but **better** **than** **Michael** Emerson or Terry O'Quinn of "Lost"?

_source.text: ABI's senior analyst Michael Morgan stated in their report that "Despite concerns of premium tier smartphone saturation, both Samsung and Apple were able to deliver better than expected results in the second quarter."

text: ABI's senior analyst **Michael** **Morgan** stated in their report that "Despite concerns of premium tier
smartphone saturation, both Samsung and Apple were able to deliver **better** **than** expected results in the second quarter."

_source.text: A few famous saints, when you come to read their life's story, don't hold up too well to modern scrutiny, but Cuthbert, while no Francis of Assisi, comes off better than most.

text: A few famous saints, when you come to read their life's story, don't hold up too well to modern scrutiny, but **Cuthbert**, while no **Francis** **of** **Assisi**, comes off **better** **than** most.
